Name: PRE-EVA

Steps.Text: Wait for cabin pressure to drop to < 1 PSIG.
When ready, open the HATCH using the COMM/TOOLs menu
Press EVA to exit the vehicle.

checklistText:
PRE-EVA
Disable OAMS:
- OAMS Controller Power: OFF
- OAMS Prop Motor Valves: CLOSED

In the ECS overhead panel:
- Pull the CABIN VENT ring handle

Wait until the CABIN PRESSURE is zero

In the ECS overhead panel:
- Push the CABIN VENT ring handle back to Normal.

Open the HATCH using the [C] menu

When ready to exit the vehicle, press the EVA button in the [C] menu. To enter, press the ENTER button in the open hatch on the outside.
